thread.title: Katie Price, Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry and Stevi Ritchie 'to make shock CBB return'
thread.title_full: Katie Price, Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry and Stevi Ritchie 'to make shock CBB return'

author: Lara Martin
title: Katie Price, Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry and Stevi Ritchie 'to make shock CBB return'
text:
Katie Price, Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry and Stevi Ritchie 'to make shock CBB return' Two returning housemates and one brand new contestant tipped to enter show tonight Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Katie Price will make a sensational return to the Celebrity Big Brother house tonight, according to reports. 
Viewers have been told two new housemates will be introduced during Friday night’s eviction show to shake things up, after Ray J and Brandon Block both left in the first week. 
But it’s now claimed a shock twist will see THREE people going in. Will Chloe be entering the CBB house? (Photo: chloegshore1/instagram) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Are these the two celebrities about to go into CBB? Share this video Watch Next 
Katie Price has been lined up to surprise housemates alongside former Celebrity Big Brother contestant Stevi Ritchie and brand new housemate Chloe Ferry, according to The Sun. 
While Katie and former X Factor star Stevi have both experienced the craziness of the house in previous years, it will be a brand new experience for Chloe. 
Although as Chloe has survived the Geordie Shore house over the years, she should be well equipped to deal with whatever Big Brother throws at her! Chloe's best known for her party antics on Geordie Shore Sporting blonde hair at the MTV EMAs last year (Photo: WENN.com) 
A source told The Sun : "If the celebs thought they’d drawn the short straw being locked up with Stacy and Austin, they’ve seen nothing yet. 
“Chloe has no filter – she will cause total pandemonium with or without a drink.” 
She’s certainly had plenty of people to seek advice from; Geordie Shore stars Scotty T, Charlotte Crosby, Marnie Simpson and Ricci Guarnaccio have all appeared in CBB in the past. 
It’s not the first time Chloe has been linked to CBB: rumours surfaced last year that she could surprise Scotty T with a late entrance during his series. Read More Chloe Ferry branded "shameless" after sharing picture of sick grandmother in hospital bed Who is Katie Price? 
Former glamour model-turned-businesswoman Katie will be leaving husband Kieran Hayler and her six kids – Harvey, Princess, Junior, Jett and Bunny – at home. Katie Price is crowned winner of Celebrity Big Brother 2015 at Elstree Studios on February 6, 2015 in Borehamwood, England (Photo: Getty) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Share this video Watch Next 
She won her series of CBB back in 2015, despite being a late arrival in the house, so no doubt she’s hoping to make all the way to the final this time again. 
Her time in the house was marred, however, as she was in pain from a botched boob job that left her with a hole in one implant. Fellow housemate Katie Hopkins memorably said: “It has started to smell like my dead hamster." Who is Stevi Ritchie? 
Stevi found fame on The X Factor, finishing in sixth place on the 11 series in 2014. He walked away from the show with something far more important however: girlfriend Chloe-Jasmine Whichello, a fellow contestant. Stevi appeared with then fiancee Chloe on CBB two years ago (Photo: Channel 5) 
After getting engaged, they appeared together in the 16 series of CBB in 2015, alongside current housemate Austin Armacost , finishing in fifth place. 
This time, however, Stevi is going solo: he recently reunited with Chloe after a brief split but she's not rumoured to be taking part. Who is Chloe Ferry? 
Chloe found fame on MTV’s Geordie Shore and quickly became a fan favourite thanks to her hard partying, no filter persona (and love of chicken nuggets.) Chloe's a feisty character on Geordie Shore 
She had an on-off flirtation with co-star Marty McKenna in the last series, and carried a torch for Scotty T . 
In recent times she’s become just as famous for her appearance as her TV show, openly admitting to a nose job and other surgical procedures to boost her looks. Read More Ray J and Brandon both left the house this week (Photo: Channel 5) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
